span.span: In February, 2018, the Avon Central School District embarked upon a wide ranging research process called Educational Legacy Planning.

The mission is to help establish a long range vision and strategic plan for the schools for decades to come. This will help the Board of Education and administration to make decisions based on the educational needs of children well into the future. It will also allow the community to have meaningful input into the future vision of the Avon Schools, assuring that educational excellence will be maintained and enhanced for future generations of students.
We welcome your thoughts and involvement. We will be building and updating this site as the process progresses. Please visit the website often at
. We value and need your involvement.
Please contact us for more information or to become involved in the process at:
Thank you in advance for your support!
